Importation d'abonnements
-------------------------

  -importsubscriptions "-generic:S:\Epsitec.Cresus\App.Aider\Samples\EERV Bonne nouvelle\2013-08-21.xlsx"

Exportation Bonne Nouvelle
--------------------------

  -exportsubscriptions -output:export-2013-08-29.txt -error:error-2013-08-29.txt -exclude-district-error:true
  -uploadsubscriptions -input:export-2013-08-29.txt -publicationdate:2013-08-29 -response:tamedia-2013-08-29.log

  -uploadsubscriptions -input:export-2013-09-26.txt -publicationdate:2013-09-26 -response:tamedia-2013-09-26.log

  -uploadsubscriptions -input:export-2013-10-31.txt -publicationdate:2013-10-31 -response:tamedia-2013-10-31.log
